subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|亼|口|t2=mouth|ls=ic}} : Two mouths speaking together.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=hé
|m-s=ho2
|c=hap6
|h=pfs=ha̍p/kap/kak
|mn=ha̍p/qz,tw,xm:ha̍h/zz:a̍h
|mn_note=ha̍p - used only to mean 'join', 'to combine', 'to unite' and literary readings; ha̍h/a̍h - vernacular;
|mn-t=hah8/hab8/gab8
|mn-t_note=hab8 - alternative pronunciation for "to close"; gab8 - dialectal usage "combining" (e.g. 合藥)
|mc=1
|oc=2,2
|ma=
|cat=v,a,n,pn
}}
